Name: debt-report
Label: Debt Report

Components.Label: ShipmentFee
Components.Query:
{
    "sql": "select newid() as Id,{GroupBy},
    sum(isnull(Quantity,1)) as Quantity,
    (case when {Currency} = 1 then
    SUM(CASE WHEN (ds.CurrencyCode = 'USD' or ds.CurrencyCode = 'VND') THEN (case when (ds.TypeId = 1 or (ds.TypeId in (3,4) and ds.IsAdvCustomer = 1)) then isnull(TotalAmountTax,0) else 0 end)*ds.ExchangeRateUSD ELSE (case when (ds.TypeId = 1 or (ds.TypeId in (3,4) and ds.IsAdvCustomer = 1)) then isnull(TotalAmountTax,0) else 0 end) / ds.ExchangeRateUSD END)
    else
        SUM(case when (ds.TypeId = 1 or (ds.TypeId in (3,4) and ds.IsAdvCustomer = 1)) then ds.TotalAmountTax * ds.ExchangeRateVND else 0 end)
    end) as AR,
    sum(case when (ds.TypeId = 1 or (ds.TypeId in (3,4) and ds.IsAdvCustomer = 1)) then isnull(TotalAmountTax,0) else 0 end) as AROG,
    sum(case when (ds.TypeId = 2 or (ds.TypeId in (3,4) and ds.IsAdvCustomer = 0)) then isnull(TotalAmountTax,0) else 0 end) as APOG,
    (case when {Currency} = 1 then
    SUM(CASE WHEN (ds.CurrencyCode = 'USD' or ds.CurrencyCode = 'VND') THEN (case when (ds.TypeId = 2 or (ds.TypeId in (3,4) and ds.IsAdvCustomer = 0)) then isnull(TotalAmountTax,0) else 0 end)*ds.ExchangeRateUSD ELSE (case when (ds.TypeId = 2 or (ds.TypeId in (3,4) and ds.IsAdvCustomer = 0)) then isnull(TotalAmountTax,0) else 0 end) / ds.ExchangeRateUSD END)
    else
        SUM(case when (ds.TypeId = 2 or (ds.TypeId in (3,4) and ds.IsAdvCustomer = 0)) then ds.TotalAmountTax * ds.ExchangeRateVND else 0 end)
    end) as AP,
    ((case when {Currency} = 1 then
    SUM(CASE WHEN (ds.CurrencyCode = 'USD' or ds.CurrencyCode = 'VND') THEN (case when (ds.TypeId = 1 or (ds.TypeId in (3,4) and ds.IsAdvCustomer = 1)) then isnull(TotalAmountTax,0) else 0 end)*ds.ExchangeRateUSD ELSE (case when (ds.TypeId = 1 or (ds.TypeId in (3,4) and ds.IsAdvCustomer = 1)) then isnull(TotalAmountTax,0) else 0 end) / ds.ExchangeRateUSD END)
    else
        SUM(case when (ds.TypeId = 1 or (ds.TypeId in (3,4) and ds.IsAdvCustomer = 1)) then ds.TotalAmountTax * ds.ExchangeRateVND else 0 end)
    end)
    -
    (case when {Currency} = 1 then
    SUM(CASE WHEN (ds.CurrencyCode = 'USD' or ds.CurrencyCode = 'VND') THEN (case when (ds.TypeId = 2 or (ds.TypeId in (3,4) and ds.IsAdvCustomer = 0)) then isnull(TotalAmountTax,0) else 0 end)*ds.ExchangeRateUSD ELSE (case when (ds.TypeId = 2 or (ds.TypeId in (3,4) and ds.IsAdvCustomer = 0)) then isnull(TotalAmountTax,0) else 0 end) / ds.ExchangeRateUSD END)
    else
        SUM(case when (ds.TypeId = 2 or (ds.TypeId in (3,4) and ds.IsAdvCustomer = 0)) then ds.TotalAmountTax * ds.ExchangeRateVND else 0 end)
    end)) as Balance
    from ShipmentFee as ds 
    where (ds.{DateFieldId} >= '{FromDate}' and ds.{DateFieldId} < '{ToDate}' 
    and ds.IsComplete in ({Complete}) 
    and ds.IsPaid in ({Paid}) 
    and ds.IsObh in ({Obh}) 
    and ds.IsInvoice in ({Invoice})
    and ds.IsNoDocs in ({NoDocs})
    and ds.ShipmentTypeId in ({ShipmentTypeId})
    and ({FeeTypeId})
    and ds.IsLock in ({Lock})
    and ds.IsPaymentAcc in ({PaymentAcc})
    and ds.IsDebtAcc in ({DebtAcc})
    and ('{DescriptionIds}' = '' or ds.DescriptionId in (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{DescriptionIds}', ',')))
    and (('{FileIds}' = '' or ds.FileId in (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{FileIds}', ','))))
    and (('{HblIds}' = '' or ds.ShipmentId in (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{HblIds}', ','))))
    and ('{VendorIds}' = '' or ds.VendorId in (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{VendorIds}', ',')))
    and ('{DebtIds}' = '' or ds.DebtId in (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{DebtIds}', ',')))
    and ('{PaymentIds}' = '' or ds.PaymentAccId in (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{PaymentIds}', ',')))
    and ('{SaleIds}' = '' or ds.SaleId in (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{SaleIds}', ',')))
    and ('{TypeIds}' = '' or ds.ServiceId in (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{TypeIds}', ',')))
    AND ('{DepartmentId}' = '' or ds.DepartmentId = '{DepartmentId}')
    and ((-2 = {Vat} OR (-2 != {Vat} AND ds.Vat = {Vat})) OR (-1 = {Vat} AND ds.Vat IS NULL))
    )
    group by {GroupBy}",
    "total": "select count(*) as total
	from (select count(ds.Id) as total from ShipmentFee as ds 
    where (ds.{DateFieldId} >= '{FromDate}' and ds.{DateFieldId} < '{ToDate}' 
    and ds.IsComplete in ({Complete}) 
    and ds.IsPaid in ({Paid}) 
    and ds.IsObh in ({Obh}) 
    and ds.IsInvoice in ({Invoice})
    and ds.IsNoDocs in ({NoDocs})
    and ds.ShipmentTypeId in ({ShipmentTypeId})
    and ({FeeTypeId})
    and ds.IsLock in ({Lock})
    and ds.IsPaymentAcc in ({PaymentAcc})
    and ds.IsDebtAcc in ({DebtAcc})
    and ('{DescriptionIds}' = '' or ds.DescriptionId in (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{DescriptionIds}', ',')))
    and (('{FileIds}' = '' or ds.FileId in (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{FileIds}', ','))))
    and (('{HblIds}' = '' or ds.ShipmentId in (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{HblIds}', ','))))
    and ('{VendorIds}' = '' or ds.VendorId in (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{VendorIds}', ',')))
    and ('{DebtIds}' = '' or ds.DebtId in (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{DebtIds}', ',')))
    and ('{PaymentIds}' = '' or ds.PaymentAccId in (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{PaymentIds}', ',')))
    and ('{SaleIds}' = '' or ds.SaleId in (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{SaleIds}', ',')))
    and ('{TypeIds}' = '' or ds.ServiceId in (SELECT value FROM STRING_SPLIT('{TypeIds}', ',')))
    AND ('{DepartmentId}' = '' or ds.DepartmentId = '{DepartmentId}')
    and ((-2 = {Vat} OR (-2 != {Vat} AND ds.Vat = {Vat})) OR (-1 = {Vat} AND ds.Vat IS NULL))
    )
    group by {GroupBy}) as ds"
}
Components.PreQuery:
{
    "FromDate": this.EditForm.Entity.FromDate ? this.dayjs(this.EditForm.Entity.FromDate).format('YYYY-MM-DD') : '',
    "ToDate": this.EditForm.Entity.ToDate ? this.dayjs(this.EditForm.Entity.ToDate).format('YYYY-MM-DD') : '',
    "DepartmentId": this.EditForm.Entity.DepartmentId || "",
    "DateFieldId": this.EditForm.Entity.DateFieldId ? this.EditForm.Entity.DateFieldId : 'ShipmentDate',
    "Complete": this.EditForm.Entity.Complete || "1",
    "Paid": this.EditForm.Entity.Paid || "0,1",
    "Obh": this.EditForm.Entity.Obh || "0,1",
    "FeeTypeId": this.EditForm.Entity.FeeTypeId || "ds.TypeId in (1,2,3,4)",
    "Invoice": this.EditForm.Entity.Invoice || "0,1",
    "NoDocs": this.EditForm.Entity.NoDocs || "0,1",
    "Lock": this.EditForm.Entity.Lock || "0,1",
    "ShipmentTypeId": this.EditForm.Entity.ShipmentTypeId || "0,1",
    "DebtAcc": this.EditForm.Entity.DebtAcc || "0,1",
    "PaymentAcc": this.EditForm.Entity.PaymentAcc || "0,1",
    "Currency": this.EditForm.Entity.Currency || 0,
    "GroupBy": this.EditForm.Entity.GroupBy || "HblNo,MblNo,FileId,VendorId,CurrencyId",
    "DescriptionIds": this.EditForm.Entity.DescriptionIds ? this.EditForm.Entity.DescriptionIds : "",
    "FileIds": this.EditForm.Entity.FileIds ? this.EditForm.Entity.FileIds : "",
    "HblIds": this.EditForm.Entity.HblIds ? this.EditForm.Entity.HblIds : "",
    "PaymentIds": this.EditForm.Entity.PaymentIds ? this.EditForm.Entity.PaymentIds : "",
    "DebtIds": this.EditForm.Entity.DebtIds ? this.EditForm.Entity.DebtIds : "",
    "SaleIds": this.EditForm.Entity.SaleIds ? this.EditForm.Entity.SaleIds : "",
    "VendorIds": this.EditForm.Entity.VendorIds ? this.EditForm.Entity.VendorIds : "",
    "TypeIds": this.EditForm.Entity.TypeIds ? this.EditForm.Entity.TypeIds : "",
    "Vat": this.EditForm.Entity.Vat || -2
}
